attributes.action: commence legal proceedings intended to consider whether the directors of failed UK banks should be added to Companies House's Register of Disqualified Directors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Several UK banks have been managed in such a way that their Directors appear to have felt the need to resort to seeking taxpayers' money to permit continuing operation.  The UK legal system should consider whether the Directors of these institutions have acted in a way that would disqualify them from acting as Directors in any UK registered company.
